property.name: objectName
property.label: Object Name
property.description: Which object is the user going to select fields from?

property.name: allowLookups
property.label: Enable lookups?
property.description: Allow users to select from fields on objects related via a lookup field. Lookups appear as a list before the standard field list, denoted with a right chevron icon. Default: false

property.name: selectedFieldsNamesString
property.label: Selected Fields Names String
property.description: Output list of the API names of the fields selected by the user
